author: cziegeler
msg: Adding maven target directory to .cvsignore

author: blumm
msg: This patch enables 'commons logging'. Please take a look at
jakarta-pluto\war\WEB-INF\config\services.properties. There
you can switch between the Pluto's 'traditional' logging
and the 'commons logging'.
PR:
Submitted by:	Nick Lothian/nl@essential.com.au
